items.sentence: I don\'t think we\'ll reach Boston before dark.
I don\'t think you should follow Tom\'s advice.
I don\'t understand what you\'re talking about.
Let\'s see what else we can find out about Tom.
Many Boston residents oppose the mayor\'s plan.
Tom asked his father if he could go to a movie.
Tom asked me if I found what I was looking for.
Tom asked me if I had finished my homework yet.
Tom asked me if I knew anyone who spoke French.
Tom asked me if he could borrow thirty dollars.
